about_the_game:
Pulp Themed Map Pack


Get your treasure map, gun and gear ready. This pack has 26 battle maps for a GM looking to run encounters in a pulp game and includes the following:

  • Airship interior map
  • 3 city street maps
  • Museum map
  • 2 city roof maps
  • 2 park maps
  • Illegal whiskey still
  • 2 desert market maps
  • Oasis map
  • Desert ruins map
  • 2 desert temple maps
  • 4 jungle maps
  • 2 jungle temple maps
  • grotto map
  • ship map
  • 2 hangar maps

The module contains maps optimized for online use in Fantasy Grounds.

Requirements: A license for Fantasy Grounds (Standard or Ultimate) or an active license subscription.
detailed_description:
Pulp Themed Map Pack


Get your treasure map, gun and gear ready. This pack has 26 battle maps for a GM looking to run encounters in a pulp game and includes the following:

  • Airship interior map
  • 3 city street maps
  • Museum map
  • 2 city roof maps
  • 2 park maps
  • Illegal whiskey still
  • 2 desert market maps
  • Oasis map
  • Desert ruins map
  • 2 desert temple maps
  • 4 jungle maps
  • 2 jungle temple maps
  • grotto map
  • ship map
  • 2 hangar maps

The module contains maps optimized for online use in Fantasy Grounds.

Requirements: A license for Fantasy Grounds (Standard or Ultimate) or an active license subscription.
